Debugging

23 Feb 2016

Ruh roh broken code (Thanks, Aileen!)

Read the error messages. Try to fix the bugs, and include a comment for what you changed, and why.

Hint: Try reading reading the error messages. They'll point you to a specific line number. Look one line up or down, seeing if you spot anything off.

If you finish that, go read my comments on your Quiz_App and resume working.
